p: An overall expansion in the modelled distribution of a range of all 11 species is predicted under future climatic conditions under RCP 2.6 and RCP 8.5 by the year 2050 and 2070. Vegetation in the village development committee areas in the following districts of Nepal are highly susceptible to invasion by these IAPS: (i) Darchula district: Boharigaun, Bramhadev, Dattu, Dethala, Dhaulakot, Gokuleshwar, Huti, Lali, Pipalchaur, Sarmauli, Shikhar, Tapoban, (ii) Baitadi district: Gokuleshwor, Rim, Rudreswor, Shivalinga, Siddhapuri, Siddheswor, Sittad, (iii) Bajhang district: Chaudhari, Lamatola, Latinath, Malumela, Matela, Rayal, Subeda ( Fig 3).
